title: theinvestdude
author: theinvestdude
content: ★ WEBSITE ★ TELEGRAM CHANNEL ★  TELEGRAM GROUP ★ TWITTER ★ MASTER SPREADSHEETS ★ STAKES SPREADSHEETS BOUNTY GENERAL DETAILS1. Bounty is solely manage by Theinvestdude.2. $25,000 worth of CBL Tokens  will be divided to all qualified stakes accumulated for the duration of the bounty.3. CryptoBalls Bounty Program started October 17, 2022 and will end on November 17, 2022 (4 WEEKS)4. Bounty week starts on Monday and will end on Sunday of the same week.5. Bounty rewards will be distributed in 4 equal parts, first 25% after 1 month after bounty ends | 25% After 2 Months | 25% After 3 Months | 25% after 4 Months6. Deadline of submission is every Sunday 3:00 PM UTC to give way for the weekly checking.Disclaimer: We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.BOUNTY GENERAL RULES1. Must follow CryptoBalls Twitter: TWITTER2. Must follow CryptoBalls Telegram Channel: TELEGRAM CHANNEL3. Must Join CryptoBalls Telegram group: TELEGRAM GROUP4. Must Subscribe to partner Youtube Channel: YOUTUBE5. Must Follow partner bounty Channel:Bounty Channel 6. For any question, Join our official Bounty Group:BOUNTY GROUP7. All users must post proof of authenticationQuote#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Weekly Report Post FormCode:Week #: Bitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk profile linkTelegram Username:BSC Wallet Address:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:#Twitter Followers:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:Retweet #1Retweet #2Retweet #3Retweet #4Retweet #5OWN TWEET #1OWN TWEET #2[b]Facebook Campaign[/b]Group Post #1Group Post #2Group Post #3Group Post #4Group Post #5PUBLIC PROFILE POST #1PUBLIC PROFILE POST #2[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:TG post #1TG post #2TG post #3TG post #4TG post #5User Invited: @username, @username (Max of 10 Weekly)Youtube Video #1Youtube Video #2Article #1Article #2BOUNTY ALLOCATIONSTWITTER= 50% | FACEBOOK= 20% | YOUTUBE= 10% | ARTICLE= 10% | TELEGRAM= 10% BOUNTY SCHEDULEWEEK #1 10/17/2022 - 10/23/2022=ACTIVEGeneral Twitter Bounty Rules1. Must Follow our Twitter Account TWITTER2. Must have atleast 300 real followers3. Account must be active with crypto related content4. Must use hash tags #Airdrop #CBL #CryptoBalls #BSC #BinanceSmartChain #Presale #ICO5. Must Retweet 5x weekly + 2x "OWN TWEET" Weekly6. Max of 1 RT and 1 own tweet per dayRewards: 300 to 1000 Followers: 1 Stake/ RT|Tweet1001 to 3000 Followers: 2 Stakes/ RT|Tweet3001 to 10,000 Followers: 3 Stakes / RT|TweetFill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Facebook Bounty Rules1. Must have atleast 300 FB Friends/Followers2. Must use hash tags #Airdrop #CBL #CryptoBalls #BSC #BinanceSmartChain #Presale #ICO3. Post 5x weekly in different crypto related facebook public group about CryptoBalls4. All post must be related to CRYPTOBALLS - Generic Post will receive ZERO STAKES5. Create 2x public post weekly on your profile regarding CryptoBalls6. All post must include website linkRewards:  1 stake/postFill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Youtube Bounty Rules1. Must Have atleast 100 Real Subcriber2. Video must be explain CRYPTOBALLS Token (Airdrop, Presale, Features)3. Video must be 1:20 Minutes long4. Video Description must include website,twitter and telegram links5. Add your bitcointalk username on the video descriptions6. Each user can submit 2 videos per bounty week7. Creating videos about bounty and twitter page will receive "0" StakesRewards: Upto 100 Stakes depending on engagement/views and subscribers count.Fill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Article Bounty Rules1. Must Have atleast 100 Real Subcriber, Followers (steemit, medium etc...)2. Article must be explain CryptoBalls Token (Airdrop, Presale, Features)3. Article must be 500 words long4. Article must include website,twitter and telegram links5. Add your bitcointalk username on the Article foot notes6. Each user can submit 2 Article per bounty week7. Copy paste article will receive ZERO STAKESRewards: Upto 100 Stakes depending on engagement/viewsFill form to Join: SUBMITGeneral Telegram Bounty Rules1. Must Join & Follow Telegram Channel  & Group 2. Must post 1x Daily on official telegram group (5x max weekly)3. Must post/shill 1x Daily (5x max weekly) on other crypto related group - Don't forget to add website link or telegram link4. OPTIONAL: Add your friends/contacts on our telegram group (10x Max Weekly)5. Spamming in dead bounty group, spam group or posting all 5 post in one day = zero stakesRewards: 1 Stake per post | 1 Stake/ added memberFill form to Join: SUBMIT
